text: function bvh-node::create(object-array A, int AXIS) N= A length if (N= 1) then left=A[0] right = NULL bbox = bounding-box(A[0]) else if (N= 2) then left-node = A[0] right-node = A[1] bbox = combine(bounding-box(A[0]), bounding-box(A[1])) else sort A by the object center along AXIS left= new bvh-node(A[0..N/2 — 1], (AXIS +1) mod 3) right = new bvh-node(A[N/2..N—1], (AXIS +1) mod 3) bbox = combine(left — bbox, right — bbox)
